title: The Golden Finger Encyclopedia - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Apocalypse   Bestiality   Black Belly   Cannibalism   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Cunning Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Dishonest Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Incest   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Older Love Interests   Pill Based Cultivation   Revenge   R*pe   System Administrator   Transmigration   Tribal Society   Werebeasts   World Hopping   Zombies
author: 流年飞雪
description:
What is the world like after death?

Cong Sheng didn’t know others but he knew his own.

Looking at the huge wheel in front of him that was shining with pale white brilliance, he stretched out his hand without hesitation.

So…

He traveled through countless worlds, experienced all kinds of (dog blood) (wonderful) (hard) life, and struggled (extraordinarily hard) on his long road to becoming a god…>
